HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Za každých utracených 5 000 Kč včetně DPH je jedno přepravné v rámci objednávky zdarma.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Odesílání zásilek probíha každý pracovní den.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only specified delivery method is home delivery within the Czech Republic. There is no mention of parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup on the shipping page.
PROVIDERS: Shipping is handled exclusively by DPD.
PRICING: Standard shipping costs 110 Kč for packages up to 30 kg. Shipping is free for every 5,000 Kč spent. Cash on delivery (COD) has a surcharge of 20 Kč.
RESTRICTIONS: A weight limit of 30 kg per package applies. No information is provided for bulky or oversized items.
NOTABLE FEATURES: COD payments can be made by card upon delivery. Shipments are dispatched every working day. Order tracking is available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is very limited and concise. It only details a single delivery option and provider (DPD home delivery). Key details such as estimated delivery timeframes, express options, and other common delivery methods are missing, which makes the information incomplete.
